verses.verse: Against Moab <WH4124> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD <WH3068> of hosts, <WH6635> the God <WH430> of Israel; <WH3478> Woe <WH1945> unto <WH413> Nebo! <WH5015> for <WH3588> it is spoiled: <WH7703> Kiriathaim <WH7156> is confounded <WH3001> and taken: <WH3920> Misgab <WH4869> is confounded <WH3001> and dismayed. <WH2865>

There shall be no <WH369> more <WH5750> praise <WH8416> of Moab: <WH4124> in Heshbon <WH2809> they have devised <WH2803> evil <WH7451> against <WH5921> it; come, <WH1980> and let us cut it off <WH3772> from being a nation. <WH4480> <WH1471> Also <WH1571> thou shalt be cut down, <WH1826> O Madmen; <WH4086> the sword <WH2719> shall pursue <WH1980> <WH310> thee.
A voice <WH6963> of crying <WH6818> shall be from Horonaim, <WH4480> <WH2773> spoiling <WH7701> and great <WH1419> destruction. <WH7667>
Moab <WH4124> is destroyed; <WH7665> her little ones <WH6810> have caused a cry <WH2201> to be heard. <WH8085>

For <WH3588> in the going up <WH4608> of Luhith <WH3872> continual weeping <WH1065> <WH1065> shall go up; <WH5927> for <WH3588> in the going down <WH4174> of Horonaim <WH2773> the enemies <WH6862> have heard <WH8085> a cry <WH6818> of destruction. <WH7667>
Flee, <WH5127> save <WH4422> your lives, <WH5315> and be <WH1961> like the heath <WH6176> in the wilderness. <WH4057>

For <WH3588> because <WH3282> thou hast trusted <WH982> in thy works <WH4639> and in thy treasures, <WH214> thou <WH859> shalt also <WH1571> be taken: <WH3920> and Chemosh <WH3645> shall go forth <WH3318> into captivity <WH1473> with his priests <WH3548> and his princes <WH8269> together. <WH3162>

And the spoiler <WH7703> shall come <WH935> upon <WH413> every <WH3605> city, <WH5892> and no <WH3808> city <WH5892> shall escape: <WH4422> the valley <WH6010> also shall perish, <WH6> and the plain <WH4334> shall be destroyed, <WH8045> as <WH834> the LORD <WH3068> hath spoken. <WH559>

Give <WH5414> wings <WH6731> unto Moab, <WH4124> that <WH3588> it may flee <WH5323> and get away: <WH3318> for the cities <WH5892> thereof shall be <WH1961> desolate, <WH8047> without any <WH4480> <WH369> to dwell <WH3427> therein. <WH2004>

Cursed <WH779> be he that doeth <WH6213> the work <WH4399> of the LORD <WH3068> deceitfully, <WH7423> and cursed <WH779> be he that keepeth back <WH4513> his sword <WH2719> from blood. <WH4480> <WH1818>

Moab <WH4124> hath been at ease <WH7599> from his youth, <WH4480> <WH5271> and he <WH1931> hath settled <WH8252> on <WH413> his lees, <WH8105> and hath not <WH3808> been emptied <WH7324> from vessel <WH4480> <WH3627> to <WH413> vessel, <WH3627> neither <WH3808> hath he gone <WH1980> into captivity: <WH1473> therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> his taste <WH2940> remained <WH5975> in him, and his scent <WH7381> is not <WH3808> changed. <WH4171>

Therefore, <WH3651> behold, <WH2009> the days <WH3117> come, <WH935> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> that I will send <WH7971> unto him wanderers, <WH6808> that shall cause him to wander, <WH6808> and shall empty <WH7324> his vessels, <WH3627> and break <WH5310> their bottles. <WH5035>
And Moab <WH4124> shall be ashamed <WH954> of Chemosh, <WH4480> <WH3645> as <WH834> the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> was ashamed <WH954> of Bethel <WH4480> <WH1008> their confidence. <WH4009>
How <WH349> say <WH559> ye, We <WH587> are mighty <WH1368> and strong <WH2428> men <WH376> for the war? <WH4421>

Moab <WH4124> is spoiled, <WH7703> and gone up <WH5927> out of her cities, <WH5892> and his chosen <WH4005> young men <WH970> are gone down <WH3381> to the slaughter, <WH2874> saith <WH5002> the King, <WH4428> whose name <WH8034> is the LORD <WH3068> of hosts. <WH6635>
The calamity <WH343> of Moab <WH4124> is near <WH7138> to come, <WH935> and his affliction <WH7451> hasteth <WH4116> fast. <WH3966>

All <WH3605> ye that are about <WH5439> him, bemoan <WH5110> him; and all <WH3605> ye that know <WH3045> his name, <WH8034> say, <WH559> How <WH349> is the strong <WH5797> staff <WH4294> broken, <WH7665> and the beautiful <WH8597> rod! <WH4731>

Thou daughter <WH1323> that dost inhabit <WH3427> Dibon, <WH1769> come down <WH3381> from thy glory, <WH4480> <WH3519> and sit <WH3427> in thirst; <WH6772> for <WH3588> the spoiler <WH7703> of Moab <WH4124> shall come <WH5927> upon thee, and he shall destroy <WH7843> thy strongholds. <WH4013>

O inhabitant <WH3427> of Aroer, <WH6177> stand <WH5975> by <WH413> the way, <WH1870> and espy; <WH6822> ask <WH7592> him that fleeth, <WH5127> and her that escapeth, <WH4422> and say, <WH559> What <WH4100> is <WH1961> done?
Moab <WH4124> is confounded; <WH3001> for <WH3588> it is broken down: <WH2865> howl <WH3213> and cry; <WH2199> tell <WH5046> ye it in Arnon, <WH769> that <WH3588> Moab <WH4124> is spoiled, <WH7703>
And judgment <WH4941> is come <WH935> upon <WH413> the plain <WH4334> country; <WH776> upon <WH413> Holon, <WH2473> and upon <WH413> Jahazah, <WH3096> and upon <WH5921> Mephaath, <WH4158>
And upon <WH5921> Dibon, <WH1769> and upon <WH5921> Nebo, <WH5015> and upon <WH5921> Beth-diblathaim, <WH1015>
And upon <WH5921> Kiriathaim, <WH7156> and upon <WH5921> Beth-gamul, <WH1014> and upon <WH5921> Bethmeon, <WH1010>
And upon <WH5921> Kerioth, <WH7152> and upon <WH5921> Bozrah, <WH1224> and upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> the cities <WH5892> of the land <WH776> of Moab, <WH4124> far <WH7350> or near. <WH7138>
The horn <WH7161> of Moab <WH4124> is cut off, <WH1438> and his arm <WH2220> is broken, <WH7665> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

Make ye him drunken: <WH7937> for <WH3588> he magnified <WH1431> himself against <WH5921> the LORD: <WH3068> Moab <WH4124> also shall wallow <WH5606> in his vomit, <WH6892> and he <WH1931> also <WH1571> shall be <WH1961> in derision. <WH7814>

For <WH518> was <WH1961> not <WH3808> Israel <WH3478> a derision <WH7814> unto thee? was he found <WH4672> among thieves? <WH1590> for <WH3588> since <WH4480> <WH1767> thou spakest <WH1697> of him, thou skippedst for joy. <WH5110>

O ye that dwell <WH3427> in Moab, <WH4124> leave <WH5800> the cities, <WH5892> and dwell <WH7931> in the rock, <WH5553> and be <WH1961> like the dove <WH3123> that maketh her nest <WH7077> in the sides <WH5676> of the hole's <WH6354> mouth. <WH6310>

We have heard <WH8085> the pride <WH1347> of Moab, <WH4124> (he is exceeding <WH3966> proud) <WH1343> his loftiness, <WH1363> and his arrogance, <WH1347> and his pride, <WH1346> and the haughtiness <WH7312> of his heart. <WH3820>
I <WH589> know <WH3045> his wrath, <WH5678> saith <WH5002> the LORD; <WH3068> but it shall not <WH3808> be so; <WH3651> his lies <WH907> shall not <WH3808> so <WH3651> effect <WH6213> it.

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> will I howl <WH3213> for <WH5921> Moab, <WH4124> and I will cry out <WH2199> for all <WH3605> Moab; <WH4124> mine heart shall mourn <WH1897> for <WH413> the men <WH376> of Kir-heres. <WH7025>

O vine <WH1612> of Sibmah, <WH7643> I will weep <WH1058> for thee with the weeping <WH4480> <WH1065> of Jazer: <WH3270> thy plants <WH5189> are gone over <WH5674> the sea, <WH3220> they reach <WH5060> even to <WH5704> the sea <WH3220> of Jazer: <WH3270> the spoiler <WH7703> is fallen <WH5307> upon <WH5921> thy summer fruits <WH7019> and upon <WH5921> thy vintage. <WH1210>

And joy <WH8057> and gladness <WH1524> is taken <WH622> from the plentiful field, <WH4480> <WH3759> and from the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Moab; <WH4124> and I have caused wine <WH3196> to fail <WH7673> from the winepresses: <WH4480> <WH3342> none <WH3808> shall tread <WH1869> with shouting; <WH1959> their shouting <WH1959> shall be no <WH3808> shouting. <WH1959>

From the cry <WH4480> <WH2201> of Heshbon <WH2809> even unto <WH5704> Elealeh, <WH500> and even unto <WH5704> Jahaz, <WH3096> have they uttered <WH5414> their voice, <WH6963> from Zoar <WH4480> <WH6820> even unto <WH5704> Horonaim, <WH2773> as a heifer <WH5697> of three years old: <WH7992> for <WH3588> the waters <WH4325> also <WH1571> of Nimrim <WH5249> shall be <WH1961> desolate. <WH4923>

Moreover I will cause to cease <WH7673> in Moab, <WH4124> saith <WH5002> the LORD, <WH3068> him that offereth <WH5927> in the high places, <WH1116> and him that burneth incense <WH6999> to his gods. <WH430>

Therefore <WH5921> <WH3651> mine heart <WH3820> shall sound <WH1993> for Moab <WH4124> like pipes, <WH2485> and mine heart <WH3820> shall sound <WH1993> like pipes <WH2485> for <WH413> the men <WH376> of Kir-heres: <WH7025> because <WH5921> <WH3651> the riches <WH3502> that he hath gotten <WH6213> are perished. <WH6>

For <WH3588> every <WH3605> head <WH7218> shall be bald, <WH7144> and every <WH3605> beard <WH2206> clipped: <WH1639> upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> the hands <WH3027> shall be cuttings, <WH1418> and upon <WH5921> the loins <WH4975> sackcloth. <WH8242>

There shall be lamentation <WH4553> generally <WH3605> upon <WH5921> all <WH3605> the housetops <WH1406> of Moab, <WH4124> and in the streets <WH7339> thereof: for <WH3588> I have broken <WH7665> <WH853> Moab <WH4124> like a vessel <WH3627> wherein is no <WH369> pleasure, <WH2656> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

They shall howl, <WH3213> saying, How <WH349> is it broken down! <WH2865> how <WH349> hath Moab <WH4124> turned <WH6437> the back <WH6203> with shame! <WH954> so shall Moab <WH4124> be <WH1961> a derision <WH7814> and a dismaying <WH4288> to all <WH3605> them about <WH5439> him.
For <WH3588> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the LORD; <WH3068> Behold, <WH2009> he shall fly <WH1675> as an eagle, <WH5404> and shall spread <WH6566> his wings <WH3671> over <WH413> Moab. <WH4124>

Kerioth <WH7152> is taken, <WH3920> and the strongholds <WH4679> are surprised, <WH8610> and the mighty men's <WH1368> hearts <WH3820> in Moab <WH4124> at that <WH1931> day <WH3117> shall be <WH1961> as the heart <WH3820> of a woman <WH802> in her pangs. <WH6887>
And Moab <WH4124> shall be destroyed <WH8045> from being a people, <WH4480> <WH5971> because <WH3588> he hath magnified <WH1431> himself against <WH5921> the LORD. <WH3068>
Fear, <WH6343> and the pit, <WH6354> and the snare, <WH6341> shall be upon <WH5921> thee, O inhabitant <WH3427> of Moab, <WH4124> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

He that fleeth <WH5211> from <WH4480> <WH6440> the fear <WH6343> shall fall <WH5307> into <WH413> the pit; <WH6354> and he that getteth up <WH5927> out of <WH4480> the pit <WH6354> shall be taken <WH3920> in the snare: <WH6341> for <WH3588> I will bring <WH935> upon <WH413> it, even upon <WH413> Moab, <WH4124> the year <WH8141> of their visitation, <WH6486> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068>

They that fled <WH5127> stood <WH5975> under the shadow <WH6738> of Heshbon <WH2809> because of the force: <WH4480> <WH3581> but <WH3588> a fire <WH784> shall come forth <WH3318> out of Heshbon, <WH4480> <WH2809> and a flame <WH3852> from the midst <WH4480> <WH996> of Sihon, <WH5511> and shall devour <WH398> the corner <WH6285> of Moab, <WH4124> and the crown of the head <WH6936> of the tumultuous <WH7588> ones. <WH1121>

Woe <WH188> be unto thee, O Moab! <WH4124> the people <WH5971> of Chemosh <WH3645> perisheth: <WH6> for <WH3588> thy sons <WH1121> are taken <WH3947> captives, <WH7628> and thy daughters <WH1323> captives. <WH7633>

Yet will I bring again <WH7725> the captivity <WH7622> of Moab <WH4124> in the latter <WH319> days, <WH3117> saith <WH5002> the LORD. <WH3068> Thus <WH2008> far <WH5704> is the judgment <WH4941> of Moab. <WH4124>
